description.value: This kit contains lockpicks and other tools you need to use the @UUID[Compendium.pf1.pf1e-rules.x175kVqUfLGPt8tC.JournalEntryPage.cSdUATLHBFfw3v4s]{Disable Device} skill. Without these tools, you must use improvised tools, and you take a -2 circumstance penalty on @UUID[Compendium.pf1.pf1e-rules.x175kVqUfLGPt8tC.JournalEntryPage.cSdUATLHBFfw3v4s]{Disable Device} checks.
